name: Amarante
description: Foundry: Sorkin Type Co Amarante is a medium contrast condensed type. It uses unconventional Art Nouveau inspired shapes. Amarante is a display face but works surprisingly well in text and headlines too. Amarante supports a very broad range of languages. Source files are available from Google Code . To contribute to the project contact Eben Sorkin .
author: Karolina Lach
